component_patterns.ui_base: src/lib/components/ui - Card, Button, Badge, Input, Toast, etc.
component_patterns.viz: src/lib/components/viz - D3.js charts with ForceGraph, LineChart, BarChart, AreaChart
component_patterns.swarm: src/lib/components/swarm - SwarmVisualization with D3 force graph, real-time updates

existing_swarm_types.SwarmTopology: hierarchical | mesh | hybrid | ring | star | single
existing_swarm_types.SwarmNode: ForceNode extended with agentId, agentType, status, role, health, taskCount
existing_swarm_types.SwarmGraphData: swarmId, topology, nodes, links, status, health

existing_admin_types.ClaudeFlowSettings: enabled, apiEndpoint, maxAgents, topology, enableNeuralLearning, enableHNSW, memoryBackend

styling_conventions.buttons: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md text-sm font-medium

features: Topology selection (hierarchical, mesh, hybrid, ring, star)
Interactive SVG topology preview with animated visualization
Advanced settings: coordinator pull, consensus enable/toggle, consensus strategy selection
Recommended badges for hierarchical-mesh and hierarchical
Real-time training status with progress bar
Intelligence system status grid (SONA, MoE, HNSW, EWC++)
SONA performance metrics with adaptation speed

value.styling: Tailwind CSS with consistent card-based layout
value.chart_rendering: SVG-based without D3 dependency for lightweight charts
